title: How to Disable MMS Messaging on an iPhone

steps.title: ​ ​Switch​ ​the​ ​green​ ​MMS​ ​Messaging​ ​slider​ ​to​ ​the​ ​“off”​ ​position.
steps.content: ​ ​Switch​ ​the​ ​green​ ​ MMS​ ​Messaging ​ ​slider​ ​to​ ​the​ ​“off”​ ​position. ​ ​The​ ​slider​ ​will​ ​turn white.​ ​This​ ​will​ ​prevent​ ​your​ ​iPhone​ ​from​ ​sending​ ​or​ ​receiving​ ​any​ ​MMS​ ​text​ ​message.​ ​The phone​ ​will​ ​no​ ​longer​ ​be​ ​able​ ​to​ ​exchange​ ​messages​ ​with​ ​pictures,​ ​video,​ ​and​ ​other​ ​multimedia content. [1] X Research source ​ ​You​ ​will​ ​still​ ​be​ ​able​ ​to​ ​send and​ ​receive​ ​multimedia​ ​content​ ​through​ ​iMessages​ ​and​ ​email​ ​when​ ​connected​ ​to​ ​a​ ​wireless network.
